content: @Lloyd McKenzie Next you'll be telling me my lost uncle from Nigeria isn't going to send me $75,000,000 if I send him $500 clearing fees!
I have no trouble whatsoever believing you have a very odd uncle...

I got an email from a name I know well, asking "are you there, can i contact you". I saw no problem in saying "yes" (stupid me) and next thing I know I got an email explaining that there was a urgent contract (this was Dec 30 or so), and this person was asking me if I could advance some payment.
